mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM u_user WHERE id = #{po.id} and type in(1,2,3)
SELECT u.id,ue.nickname,u.mobile,ue.head_pic_url from u_user u LEFT JOIN u_user_extend ue on u.id = ue.id WHERE u.id = #{userId}

SELECT u.id, u.login_name, u.password, u.mobile, u.mail, u.qrcode, u.salt, u.update_salt, u.company_id, u.enterprise_id, u.type, u.is_available, ue.name, ue.regtime, ue.account_status FROM u_user u LEFT JOIN u_user_extend ue on u.id = ue.id WHERE ue.account_status = 0 and u.mail = #{mail}

SELECT u.id, u.login_name, u.password, u.mobile, u.mail, u.qrcode, u.salt, u.update_salt, u.company_id, u.enterprise_id, u.type, u.is_available, ue.name, ue.regtime, ue.account_status, ue.name FROM u_user u LEFT JOIN u_user_extend ue on u.id = ue.id WHERE ue.account_status = 0 and u.mail = #{mail}

SELECT u.id, u.login_name, u.password, u.mobile, u.mail, u.qrcode, u.salt, u.update_salt, u.company_id, u.is_available, u.enterprise_id, u.type, ue.name, ue.regtime, ue.account_status FROM u_user u LEFT JOIN u_user_extend ue on u.id = ue.id LEFT JOIN u_user_platform up on up.user_id = u.id WHERE u.mobile = #{mobile} and up.platform_id = #{platformId} ORDER BY ue.regtime desc

SELECT u.id, u.login_name, u.password, u.mobile, u.mail, u.qrcode, u.salt, u.update_salt, u.company_id, u.is_available, u.enterprise_id, u.type, ue.name, ue.regtime, ue.account_status, ue.channel_source, u.channel_user_unique FROM u_user u,u_user_extend ue,u_user_platform up WHERE u.id = ue.id and up.user_id = u.id and account_status = 0 and ue.status = 1 and u.mobile = #{mobile} and up.platform_id = #{platformId} ORDER BY ue.regtime desc

SELECT u.id, u.login_name, u.password, u.mobile, u.mail, u.qrcode, u.salt, u.update_salt, u.company_id, u.enterprise_id, u.type, u.is_available, ue.name, ue.regtime, ue.account_status FROM u_user u,u_user_extend ue,u_user_platform up WHERE u.id = ue.id and up.user_id = u.id and u.mobile = #{mobile} and up.platform_id = #{platformId} ORDER BY ue.create_time desc

SELECT u.id, u.login_name, u.password, u.mobile, u.mail, u.qrcode, u.salt, u.update_salt, u.company_id, u.enterprise_id, u.type, u.is_available, ue.name, ue.regtime, ue.account_status FROM u_user u,u_user_extend ue,u_user_platform up,u_user_login ul WHERE u.id = ue.id and up.user_id = u.id and u.id = ul.user_id and account_status = 0 and ue.status = 1 and u.mobile = #{mobile} and up.platform_id = #{platformId} ORDER BY ul.login_time desc,ue.regtime desc limit 0,1

SELECT u.id, u.login_name, u.password, u.mobile, u.mail, u.qrcode, u.salt, u.update_salt, u.company_id, u.enterprise_id, u.type, u.is_available, ue.name, ue.regtime, ue.account_status, ue.channel_source, u.channel_user_unique FROM u_user u LEFT JOIN u_user_extend ue on u.id = ue.id LEFT JOIN u_user_platform up on u.id = up.user_id WHERE ue.status = 1 and ue.weixin = #{weixin} and up.platform_id = #{platformId} ORDER BY ue.regtime desc

SELECT u.id, u.login_name, u.password, u.mobile, u.mail, u.qrcode, u.salt, u.update_salt, u.company_id, u.enterprise_id, u.type, u.is_available, ue.name, ue.regtime, ue.account_status, ul.login_time FROM u_user u LEFT JOIN u_user_extend ue on u.id = ue.id LEFT JOIN u_user_login ul on u.id = ul.user_id LEFT JOIN u_user_platform up on u.id = up.user_id WHERE ue.status = 1 and ue.weixin = #{weixin} and up.platform_id = #{platformId} ORDER BY ul.login_time desc,ue.regtime desc limit 0,1
SELECT id, login_name, mail, company_id, u.enterprise_id, u.type, import_records_id FROM u_user u WHERE import_records_id = #{importId}
SELECT u.id FROM u_user u,(SELECT id from u_user_extend WHERE is_administrator = #{isAdministrator} and account_status = 0) ue WHERE ue.id = u.id AND u.company_id = #{companyId} and is_available = 1

SELECT u.id, u.login_name, u.password, u.mobile, u.mail, u.qrcode, u.salt, u.update_salt, u.company_id, u.enterprise_id, u.type, u.is_available, ue.name, ue.regtime, ue.account_status, ue.is_administrator FROM u_user u,u_user_extend ue,u_user_platform up WHERE u.id = ue.id and up.user_id = u.id and ue.account_status = 0 and ue.status = 1 and ue.is_administrator = 1 and u.mobile = #{mobile} and up.platform_id = #{platformId}

SELECT u.id, u.login_name, u.password, u.mobile, u.mail, u.qrcode, u.salt, u.update_salt, u.company_id, u.enterprise_id, u.type, u.is_available, ue.name, ue.regtime, ue.account_status, ue.is_administrator, ur.id as role FROM u_user u LEFT JOIN u_user_extend ue on u.id = ue.id LEFT JOIN u_user_role uur on u.id = uur.user_id LEFT JOIN u_role ur on ur.id = uur.role_id WHERE u.id = ue.id and ue.account_status = 0 and ue.status = 1 and ur.useable = 1 and ur.platform_id = #{platformId} and u.id = #{userId}

SELECT u.id, u.login_name, u.password, u.mobile, u.mail, u.qrcode, u.salt, u.update_salt, u.company_id, u.enterprise_id, u.type, u.is_available, u.quit_time, u.is_deleted, u.payment_code, u.payment_code_uuid, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.import_records_id FROM u_user u LEFT JOIN u_company c ON u.company_id=c.id WHERE u.mail = #{mail} and c.company_name = #{companyName} limit 0,1

SELECT u.id, u.login_name, u.password, u.mobile, u.mail, u.qrcode, u.salt, u.update_salt, u.company_id, u.enterprise_id, u.type, u.is_available, u.quit_time, u.is_deleted, u.payment_code, u.payment_code_uuid, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.import_records_id FROM u_user u LEFT JOIN u_company c ON u.company_id=c.id WHERE u.login_name = #{account} or u.mobile = #{mobile}
